name: CSS Class Name Validation
description:
Detailed CSS Class name validation. Does not match invalid classname beginnings such as hyphen-digit, digit, double hyphen. Does not match on bad characters and too short class names.

Ascii text only, Does not detect unicode/encoded characters.
content:
1bad
--badhyphens
-2bad
dd%dd
x

-_-cool-_-
_-_cool_-_
-good-class
good2
AlsoGood
xxx

-foo
bar
author: Danny Blatant
